ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of LAURA MARILYN SAFRAN, Q.C., of Calgary, Alberta, as a part-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years.
